name: Egg Muffin in Muffin Pan
description: Make a big batch and freeze for easy breakfasts.
preparation: Preheat oven to 400° F (200° C) and lightly brush a Muffin Maker with oil.
Crack an egg in each mold and top with Better Than Bacon Toppe, if desired. Bake for 10–15 minutes to desired doneness.
Meanwhile, slice the English muffins in half and toast in the oven for 10 minutes.
Place an egg and grated cheese on one muffin half and top with other half.
If eating right away, melt the cheese by heating prepared sandwiches in the oven for another 5 minutes. Serve.
tips: Egg and cheese is the classic formula, but you can also add a protein of your choice, your favourite veggies, and aioli.

To portion and freeze, place all sandwiches on a Sheet Pan and put in the freezer until they are frozen, about an hour. Then, wrap sandwiches individually in plastic or foil and store in a freezer-safe bag in the freezer.

products.name: Better Than Bacon Topper
summary: Ok, bacon lovers; we see you. We know that bacon made from ‘pinto beans’ has you feeling a kind of way: skeptical. But trust us, this fan fave does not disappoint and it’s so easy to use. No need to grab a frying pan — just pop the top and shake on the taste of bacon with way less sodium, zero cholesterol, and no artificial flavors or colors (unlike popular brands). These crunchy bites are layered with smoky bacon flavor and are an amazing addition to salads, potatoes, eggs, and more!

products.name: Muffin Maker (Set of 2)
summary: Make perfect portions of your favourite sweet or savoury cupcakes, muffins, frittatas, meatloaves, & more!
